description.0: A precious sword gifted by the Day King to the brave hero in the little witch's story, only for the witch to take it and defeat the hero herself.

0.0: CRIT DMG from Elemental Bursts is increased by <cryo>16%</cryo>. When an Elemental Burst hits an opponent, gain the Blade of the Daylight Hours effect: ATK is increased by <cryo>20%</cryo>. Nearby active party members other than the equipping character have their ATK increased by <cryo>16%</cryo> for 3s.
0.1: Additionally, when the party possesses Hexerei: Secret Rite effects, the effects of Blade of the Daylight Hours are increased by an additional 75%. This effect can be triggered even if the equipping character is off-field.
